name: Scotty
summary: Step into the paws of your favorite pet and see the world from a whole new perspective in this exciting VR adventure. Begin your journey as a dog with boundless energy and no real-world skills, but a burning curiosity to explore everything around you. Immerse yourself in the rich, vibrant settings of your backyard and beyond, discovering the joys of sniffing out hidden treasures and unearthing bones, just like a real dog would.
